sentence: We started our checkout at 10 am and our shuttle arrived at 11 am
I explained that we had requested building 3 several times and why we wanted that location
While it got us where we needed to go we will not book the transportation this way again
Some of the transportation to and from the excursions seemed pretty sketchy but we learned to go with the flow and it turned out to be some of the best experiences
This resort is the last on a line for busses that stop at other resorts will cut the trip to and from in half
We arrived at the airport and had transportation there that took us to the hotel

The first week we did n’t have a problem locating a bed with shade by the main pool but towards to the end of the second week more and more beds were getting reserved earlier and earlier and we had to hunt for a bed that was n’t taken

Checked in NP I have never seen a line up of more than 1 or 2 people at front desk it ’s really amazingWe were in the building that backs onto the gazebo it ’s perfectly located for us as my husband dives quite a bit and makes visits to the dive shop often
There was mass confusion at the gate at the bus to the plane and getting on the plane
The restaurants seemed pretty similar as last time even though the names decor and locations had changed somewhat
We were in Bldg 2 club level and it was a perfect location
Highly recommend them as your transportation to the resort 40min driveI’l start with check in
Lunches in three locations including a beach hut that features different caribean style meals daily
I highly recommend this resort for its great location clean beaches restaurants staff and rooms

I go back in a heart beat just for the excellent location and sandy beach front where you can walk for miles with the softest sand clean beach front amazing comfortable cabanas although for the special on the beach ones you must pay 90 usd
This was the finest location we have visited bar none
We loved the proximity to the beach at this location
From the moment we stepped out of the complimentary limo to be greeted at the entrance to the hotel our dreams commenced
We went on 1 trip on a catamaran which meant a 7 am pickup and the whole day out had a great time especially the speed boat back

We also ate at THE GRILL good steak too SPICE for sushi and pad Thai and our first meeting with EDDY also a great server and AGAVE for Mexican RAFAEL was another great friendly server thereFor the first time in three visits we ate at the Hibachi grill located in the Spice restaurant
